attributes.action: Firmly request that all the energy suppliers reduce their tariffs during crisis.
attributes.additional_details:
Many are going to be using essential services like gas and electric whilst at home. At the best of times many people can ill afford to pay for these services whilst in full time work. Now that we are having to stay at home, where many of us will have a reduced income as a result, we will be using these services more than ever, 
Energy companies should all reduce their tariffs in order to help the nation endure and recover during this very difficult time.
attributes.background: We would like the government to firmly request that all energy companies reduce their tariffs during this COVID 19 crisis.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302256
